name: (MOBILE) Too Many Zombies... Too Many Bullets.
name_original: (MOBILE) Too Many Zombies... Too Many Bullets.
description:
This is the mobile version of our game made for the ScoreSpace game jam #17, which the game is Too Many Zombies... Too Many Bullets!

Use your joystick to move around, tap on the screen to shoot your gun, and tap the stab button to activate your knife. Also,  when selecting a level, push the gray arrow to change your level. There are 12 awesome levels to choose from and 5 different zombies to fend off! Enjoy!
